Text: WTF go to google site and download direct
Thanks, but no thanks, keywest33. I'd rather have uninhibited download speeds and a resumable torrent rather than a direct download from a file-sharing site.

It's not a fake; Chrome OS was built using OpenSUSE. There are newer versions of Chrome OS now which is what people probably /should/ be downloading but if you need an older version it'll be here for future reference.
